A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is now my least favorite Star Wars Movie.  

The dialogue has some humorous moments\, but is otherwise forgettable.
Star Wars may have always been political\, but the push in this one is just too in your face and ridiculous.
The Story?  Forgettable\, boring\, disjointed\, and very poorly written.  

This movie feels rushed with unnecessary side stories and a plot twist that was unnecessary and cheapens what could have been my favorite Star Wars moment ever.  

I cannot suggest seeing this movie and I fear for any more Star Wars movies if this is a sign of things to come.
